entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.2°C

Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
